name: BOYSEN®® Gypsum Joint Compound B‑711

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Gypsum Joint Compound B‑711 is a water-based, asbestos-free compound that is specifically made for gypsum boards. It secures the reinforcing tape and patches holes and overjoints with its high quality binders. It has outstanding sandability and crack resistance and also has very minimal shrinkage.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Surface should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other contaminants.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Drywall Substrates
info.body: Install and secure joints as per manufacturer's recommendation.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body: Putty: BOYSEN®® Gypsum Joint Compound B‑711 Primer: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Flat B‑701 Topcoat: Any water-based paint (BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ , BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™ , Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™ )
